    A list of 205 national and international academic meetings in various disciplines for key features of inclusivity and sustainability and propose solutions to make conferences more modern, effective, equitable and intellectually productive for the research community and environmentally sustainable for our planet.

Unifying Tropical Ecology

Year it was held: 2019

Years the conferences has been held: 1

Disciplines: Ecology

Gender balance/diversity statement: None

Total Attendance Cost (US dollars): $2000-$4000

Registration Cost (US dollars): $246-$582

Travel Carbon Footprint (tons of CO2) for all conference attendees: 1500

Other Carbon Footprint (tons of CO2) for all conference attendees: 300

Associated Scientific Society/Organization: British Ecological Society

Approx number of Society members (as of 2018): 6000

Approximate Number of Conference Attendees (Exhibitors included): 1000

Geographic Location(s): Edinburgh, UK

Years held (Every 6 months, Annual, Biannual, Triannual): Annual

Host, Funders and Sponsors: Frontiers in Forests and Global Change Journal (https://www.frontiersin.org/journals/forests-and-global-change#)

Digital or Virtual Options: None

Digital Archives (Recorded talks & slides): None

On-site Maternity Facilities: None

On-site Childcare Facilities/Services: None, only a Family room but It is attendee parents responsibility to ensure children are accompanied by an adult at all times.
